title: German finance minister warns of retaliation if U.S. kicks off trade war
content: German Finance Minister Christian Lindner on Friday warned that if the U.S. kicked off a trade war with the European Union, there could be retaliation.
summary: German Finance Minister Christian Lindner on Friday warned that if the U.S. kicked off a trade war with the European Union, there could be retaliation.

title: Tesla shares head for highest close in 13 months as post-earnings rally continues
content: Following Tesla's best day on the market since 2013, the stock rose almost 3% on Friday, putting it on pace for its highest close since September 2023.
summary: Following Tesla's best day on the market since 2013, the stock rose almost 3% on Friday, putting it on pace for its highest close since September 2023.

title: Jeff Bezos killed Washington Post endorsement of Kamala Harris, paper reports
content: The Washington Post planned to endorse Kamala Harris over Donald Trump before owner Jeff Bezos, the Amazon founder, decided again it, the newspaper reported.
summary: The Washington Post planned to endorse Kamala Harris over Donald Trump before owner Jeff Bezos, the Amazon founder, decided again it, the newspaper reported.

title: Abercrombie ex-CEO Mike Jeffries to plead not guilty in sex crimes case
content: Former Abercrombie & Fitch CEO Mike Jeffries, his partner Matthew Smith and associate James Jacobson face sex trafficking and interstate prostitution charges.
summary: Former Abercrombie & Fitch CEO Mike Jeffries, his partner Matthew Smith and associate James Jacobson face sex trafficking and interstate prostitution charges.

title: What McDonald's needs to do next after E. coli outbreak
content: Health authorities are investigating the source of the E. coli outbreak that has sickened 75 and led to one death.
summary: Health authorities are investigating the source of the E. coli outbreak that has sickened 75 and led to one death.

title: Russia's central bank raises key rate to 21% to rein in higher-than-forecast inflation
content: Russia's central bank on Friday raised its key interest rate by 200 basis points to 21%, citing higher-than-forecast consumer price increases.
summary: Russia's central bank on Friday raised its key interest rate by 200 basis points to 21%, citing higher-than-forecast consumer price increases.

title: Warren Buffett — worried about impersonators — says he doesn't endorse candidates or investments
content: Buffett's actions were triggered in part by a fake political endorsement alerted to him on Meta's Instagram.
summary: Buffett's actions were triggered in part by a fake political endorsement alerted to him on Meta's Instagram.

title: Elon Musk is $26 billion richer after Tesla's best day on the stock market since 2013
content: Tesla shares soared 22% on Thursday, lifting the world's richest person's net worth by roughly $26 billion.
summary: Tesla shares soared 22% on Thursday, lifting the world's richest person's net worth by roughly $26 billion.

title: Inflation undershoots to jumbo cuts: What 10 European Central Bank members said this week
content: A slew of Governing Council members spoke to CNBC at the International Monetary Fund's annual meeting in Washington, D.C. this week.
summary: A slew of Governing Council members spoke to CNBC at the International Monetary Fund's annual meeting in Washington, D.C. this week.

title: New York Stock Exchange to extend after-hours trading
content: Trading would open at 1:30 a.m. and end at 11:30 p.m. ET on weekdays on the Arca electronics exchange, if approved by regulators.
summary: Trading would open at 1:30 a.m. and end at 11:30 p.m. ET on weekdays on the Arca electronics exchange, if approved by regulators.

title: China schedules meeting expected to reveal fiscal stimulus details
content: Investors have been awaiting the gathering of the standing committee of the National People's Congress, watchful for details on any fiscal stimulus.
summary: Investors have been awaiting the gathering of the standing committee of the National People's Congress, watchful for details on any fiscal stimulus.

title: Malaysia must avoid 'boom-bust' cycles to finally claim Asian Tiger status, central bank governor says
content: Governor of Malaysian Central Bank has high hopes that 'Asian Tiger' status is near
summary: Governor of Malaysian Central Bank has high hopes that 'Asian Tiger' status is near

title: Microsoft CEO Nadella asked for pay reduction after security slip, but total comp still rose 63%
content: Following cyberattacks from China and Russia, Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella asked for his pay to be reduced.
summary: Following cyberattacks from China and Russia, Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella asked for his pay to be reduced.

title: South and North Korea troops potentially entering Ukraine war unlikely to stoke regional conflict, analysts say
content: The U.S. has confirmed that North Korean troops have been sent to Russia, with Ukraine President Zelenskyy pegging the North Korean troop count at 12,000.
summary: The U.S. has confirmed that North Korean troops have been sent to Russia, with Ukraine President Zelenskyy pegging the North Korean troop count at 12,000.

title: Apple returns to top 5 smartphone ranking in China with iPhone 16 as Huawei battle ramps up
content: Apple returned to the top five ranking of China's smartphone market, helped by the launch of the iPhone 16, but its growth was still outpaced by Huawei.
summary: Apple returned to the top five ranking of China's smartphone market, helped by the launch of the iPhone 16, but its growth was still outpaced by Huawei.

title: Georgia's election forces voters to choose between a future with Russia or Europe
content: Georgia — like other former Soviet republics — has found itself between Russia and the West, with competing forces pulling it in either direction.
summary: Georgia — like other former Soviet republics — has found itself between Russia and the West, with competing forces pulling it in either direction.

title: As the West watches Xi-Putin meetings, China touts crackdown on military goods to Russia
content: Beijing has walked a diplomatic tightrope throughout the Russia-Ukraine war.
summary: Beijing has walked a diplomatic tightrope throughout the Russia-Ukraine war.

title: Major airlines are cutting services to China or quitting entirely amid low travel demand, high costs
content: A new report from travel news site Skift shows that seven major airlines have retreated from the country in the past four months.
summary: A new report from travel news site Skift shows that seven major airlines have retreated from the country in the past four months.

title: China's steel exports expected to falter in 2025 as pain from tariffs spread
content: Steel producers in China face a double-whammy of mounting overseas tariffs and weakened domestic demand at home.
summary: Steel producers in China face a double-whammy of mounting overseas tariffs and weakened domestic demand at home.

title: 'Made in Mexico' trade controversy is provoking another kind of border war
content: Chinese and European companies that manufactured in China are moving to Mexico, with billions invested in new trade strategies, and political battles to come.
summary: Chinese and European companies that manufactured in China are moving to Mexico, with billions invested in new trade strategies, and political battles to come.

title: Why the Japanese yen is hovering near three-month lows against the dollar
content: The yen hit a low of 153.18 against the greenback, its weakest since July 31.
summary: The yen hit a low of 153.18 against the greenback, its weakest since July 31.

title: Tesla stock soars 22% for best day in over a decade on Musk's 2025 growth projection
content: Tesla shares soared 22% Thursday, the stock's best day in 11 years, following its better-than-expected third-quarter earnings.
summary: Tesla shares soared 22% Thursday, the stock's best day in 11 years, following its better-than-expected third-quarter earnings.

title: CNBC Daily Open: In this time of uncertainty, logic is driving market moves
content: The fact that we can draw a line, however fuzzy, connecting cause to effect suggests investors are scrutinizing earnings and news in a period of uncertainty.
summary: The fact that we can draw a line, however fuzzy, connecting cause to effect suggests investors are scrutinizing earnings and news in a period of uncertainty.

title: French trader bet over $28 million on Trump election win using 4 Polymarket accounts
content: Supporters of Donald Trump, including Elon Musk, have touted shifting election odds on Polymarket even as polls largely show a tight race with Kamala Harris.
summary: Supporters of Donald Trump, including Elon Musk, have touted shifting election odds on Polymarket even as polls largely show a tight race with Kamala Harris.

title: Nvidia doubles down on India with Hindi language model and major partnerships
content: Nvidia on Thursday announced a slew of partnerships with major Indian firms and launched a Hindi language model.
summary: Nvidia on Thursday announced a slew of partnerships with major Indian firms and launched a Hindi language model.

title: CNBC's Inside India newsletter: Why did India's biggest market listing this year falter on its debut?
content: Some cite the IPO's key elements as factors in its faltering stock market debut. Others say sitting on the sidelines means losing out on long-term gains.
summary: Some cite the IPO's key elements as factors in its faltering stock market debut. Others say sitting on the sidelines means losing out on long-term gains.

title: Air taxi firm Lilium's shares plunge 61% after company says main subsidiaries will file for insolvency
content: Shares of Lilium tanked Thursday after the air taxi firm said in a filing that its two main subsidiaries plan on filing for insolvency in the coming days.
summary: Shares of Lilium tanked Thursday after the air taxi firm said in a filing that its two main subsidiaries plan on filing for insolvency in the coming days.

title: Judge blocks Coach owner Tapestry's proposed acquisition of Michael Kors parent Capri
content: The FTC sued to block the merger between Tapestry and Capri, arguing it would harm consumers and employees.
summary: The FTC sued to block the merger between Tapestry and Capri, arguing it would harm consumers and employees.

title: Chinese smartphone maker Oppo doubles down on AI, says in regular talks with Google and Microsoft
content: As Chinese smartphone company Oppo gears up for a flagship phone launch overseas, it says it has weekly AI talks with Google and Microsoft senior management.
summary: As Chinese smartphone company Oppo gears up for a flagship phone launch overseas, it says it has weekly AI talks with Google and Microsoft senior management.

title: U.S. will be ‘more pro-crypto’ after this election, no matter who wins, says Ripple CEO Garlinghouse
content: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse is a big cynic on U.S. crypto regulation, but highly optimistic about the post-election environment around the corner.
summary: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse is a big cynic on U.S. crypto regulation, but highly optimistic about the post-election environment around the corner.
